channel.title: Regarding automation test suite support for Whonix ...
channel.description:
Hi,
As a user I got introduced to Whonix few months before. As a developer, I am absolute beginner to Whonix & interested to support its development activity ...
From "Ways To Contribute" list, I like to pick-up the task **"Port Tails Test Suite [archive] to Whonix ™"**
![su2SWdl|690x195](upload://4O4VRfVYYkJJYLyWNwbtqv9dVOc.png)
Want to check the feasibility of Mentor-ship support, for fast-track ramp-up on this automation topic ...
As an initial step planning to bring-up below stuffs ...
- [Tails - Manual test suite](https://tails.boum.org/contribute/release_process/test/)
- [Tails - Test suite installation and setup](https://tails.boum.org/contribute/release_process/test/setup/)
- [Tails - Running the automated test suite](https://tails.boum.org/contribute/release_process/test/usage/)
Looking for leaders comments and guidance, and like to know is there any member already working on it ...

item.title: Regarding automation test suite support for Whonix ...
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Help in that area very much appropriated!

I haven’t heard from either existing iniative (in telegram chat) for 1 month now.

  • CS Student Capstone (Bachelor's Senior project) for Whonix
  • automated test suite

Therefore I guess this task is up for grabs.

This was created:

GitHub

johncameronquinn/wats-senior-capstone

Whonix Automated Testing Suite for Team 4.1 at CofC - johncameronquinn/wats-senior-capstone

Does it work for you?

Something that could be expanded?

Read full topic

Hi,

As a user I got introduced to Whonix few months before. As a developer, I am absolute beginner to Whonix & interested to support its development activity …

From “Ways To Contribute” list, I like to pick-up the task "Port Tails Test Suite [archive] to Whonix ™"

Want to check the feasibility of Mentor-ship support, for fast-track ramp-up on this automation topic …

As an initial step planning to bring-up below stuffs …

  • Tails - Manual test suite

  • Tails - Test suite installation and setup

  • Tails - Running the automated test suite

Looking for leaders comments and guidance, and like to know is there any member already working on it …
